name: Four Gates
description:
Four gates of heaven are closed – every living being is dying of a mysterious sickness. To save the planet, you developed a cure. Unfortunately, your symptoms got worsened before you had a chance to take it. Now you see weird monsters... You remember nothing except that the medicine is on the sevens floor.

Contols: 

  • Use the arrow keys to move, navigate menus, and choose directions of the  applications of skills;
  • X opens the list of skills, selects skills, and activate skills;
  • C closes the current window or cancels the application of a skill.
